Happynest

Investing in Real Estate has never been this pretty

HappyNest is a mobile app which allows investors to set their goals, targets, mile-stones and everything related to the investments they are planning to do. The system invests the money based on your preferences automatically and notify you how much profit you are earning regularly.

  • Platforms
  • iOS Application
  • Web Dashboard
  • Website
  • Process
  • Requirements Gathering
  • Market Research
  • Inspiration
  • Wire-framing
  • User Experience
  • Ideation / Concept
  • Visual Design
  • Problem Solving

    Challenge

    The business model looks complex and risky when it comes to money management and handling, therefor I had to come up with something which serves the purpose really well but also don’t make the user feel bored.

  • Thinking and Brainstorming

    Stategy & Approach

    The strategy was to come up with something light, friendly, and trustful because it’s all amount trading and investments.

  • Result

    Final Visuals

    The finished product was a little more than what the client expected, it took some decent time to finalize the UX and UI for each and every function, but it was worth it.

The Finished App UI

Well, I believe the below presentation of the app screen will explain everything itself.

Dashboard Design

The dashboard was designed for the administration purpose to view, control, edit, approve or reject any transactions by sending messages to the investors and to make sure everything is streamlined for all users and properties as well.

Landing Page

The marketing landing page of the product planned to be simple and to the point, just to explain what the app does, how efficiently it manages everything for you, but of-course it had to be in synced with the brand identity of the product by using icons, illustrations and flow.

Color Palette

The colors had to be modern but also keeping the trust factor in mind. The yellow/gold was used to denote the money/gold factor but in a lighter tone so it’s all soft and easy.

  • #ffc60b
  • #349ff4
  • #0041a7
  • #44474b
  • #e4eaed
  • #adbbcb
